articles.title: Claudia Conway makes 'American Idol' debut
articles.description: Claudia Conway, daughter of lawyer George Conway and former counselor to President Trump Kellyanne Conway, will make her singing debut in the new season of "American Idol".

articles.author: Theresa Waldrop and Jeremy Grisham
articles.title: Dallas police officer directing traffic killed by suspected drunk driver
articles.description: A 32-year-old man was charged with intoxication manslaughter after a car he was driving allegedly struck and killed a Dallas police officer who was blocking the scene of an earlier accident on an expressway, police said.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson, CNN
articles.title: An Alabama animal shelter is using speed dating to get longtime residents adopted for Valentine's Day
articles.description: An animal shelter in Auburn, Alabama, is spicing up Valentine's Day for its animals by matching them with potential owners in a unique way.

articles.author: Pamela Brown and Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Trump was aware Pence had been evacuated to secure location as rioters stormed Capitol
articles.description: President Donald Trump was aware his vice president had been evacuated to a secure location as rioters stormed the US Capitol, according to a person who was with Trump on January 6.
articles.content:

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Why Democrats blinked in the Senate impeachment trial
articles.description: On Saturday morning, Democrats appeared to score a coup: Winning a surprise vote on calling witnesses in the impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.title: Inside the Senate: Sketches from a dramatic Day 5 of the Trump impeachment trial
articles.description: Senators voted on a surprise move by the House managers on Saturday to allow for witnesses in the impeachment trial of former President Donald Trump.

articles.title: GOP Sen. Mike Lee hands over phone records to House impeachment managers

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: GOP lawmaker tied to surprise call for witnesses in Trump impeachment trial has broken with party before
articles.description: The Republican congresswoman who triggered a surprise call for witnesses in the waning hours of former President Donald Trump's second impeachment trial has logged a decade in Congress -- at times breaking from her party and standing up to Trump.

articles.author: David Williams and Kevin Dotson, CNN
articles.title: LeBron James breaks NBA record for most career turnovers
articles.description: Los Angeles Lakers superstar LeBron James just set a new NBA record, but it probably won't be the highlight of his legendary career.

articles.author: Melissa Alonso and Kelly McCleary, CNN
articles.title: Several injured in crash involving more than 20 vehicles on icy Nashville road
articles.description: At least a dozen people were injured Saturday when 21 vehicles were involved in a crash on an icy Nashville road, the city's fire department said.

articles.title: Senate laughs during Trump lawyer's speech
articles.description: Senators laughed after former President Trump's defense lawyer Michael van der Veen mispronounced 'Philadelphia' during Trump's second impeachment trial.

articles.author: Jay Croft, CNN
articles.title: Ashley Judd recounts 'harrowing' leg injury in African jungle
articles.description: Actress Ashley Judd is in an ICU unit in South Africa after her leg was "shattered" in an accident in the Congo, which she recounted in an Instagram Live interview.
